title: Ep 491 | Jase Speaks Out on Struggles with Anxiety & One Big Truth Atheists & Agnostics Don't Get
description:
Phil names the rarest commodity, the most difficult to obtain, that anyone could ever hope for — then he tells you how to get it. Zach asks the question, "Who is He?" and looks at the terms diversity and unity, then asks what they have in common with submission to God. Jase says that the people who aren't even sure about God's existence don't realize that the Lord is near. Al explains how those who are trying to find the limits of their freedom have missed the point of being content in Christ. And Jase talks about those who struggle with anxiety and the decisions they have to make to experience peace of mind.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit our show sponsor BetterHelp at https://BetterHelp.com/Unashamed and get 10% off of your first month of counseling
